Key Match Events: LeBron James hit a huge three-pointer with 38 seconds remaining to give the Lakers a one-point lead.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James proved that his clutch gene hasn't gone anywhere, even at 40 years old.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis recorded his third 30-plus point game in his last five appearances.
Rookie sensation Dalton Knecht had a career-best night with 27 points and five threes.
Others: The Lakers have improved to 9-4 under head coach JJ Redick.
